definition: to stand/to set up/to establish/to lay down/to draw up/at once/immediately

sentences.english: The Fourier transform is a classical method for analyzing signal singularities.
sentences.chinese: 傅立葉變換是分析信號奇異性的傳統方法。

sentences.english: Present a definition of cepstrum based on Fractional Fourier Transform.
sentences.chinese: 給出了基於分數階傅立葉變換的倒譜。

sentences.english: Its surface chemical composition was changed after plasma treatments and was characterized by Scanning Electronic Mirror -SEM, Fourier Transformed Infrared Spectra -FTIR accordingly.
sentences.chinese: 用傅立葉變換紅外光譜和掃描電鏡分析改性前後樣品。

sentences.english: Goertzel algorithm is a fast algorithm of DFT.
sentences.chinese: 戈澤爾算法是離散傅立葉變換的一種快速算法。

sentences.english: Data was analysed by means of F. F. T. and the spectrum of sea wave was thus obtained.
sentences.chinese: 對記錄數據作快速傅立葉變換分析，獲得了海浪譜。

sentences.english: This includes Fourier series, the Fourier transform, and Fourier analysis on (some) abelian groups.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分研究有限阿貝爾羣上的傅立葉分析。

sentences.english: The pulse signals were processed by using the fast Fourier transforms.
sentences.chinese: 應用快速傅立葉變換方法對脈搏信號進行了分析。

sentences.english: The nonlinear evolution equations were solved by a semi-implicit Fourier-spectral scheme.
sentences.chinese: 上述非線性演化方程利用半隱傅立葉頻域法求解。

sentences.english: This Fourier transform also has applications in mathematical physics and quantum information theory.
sentences.chinese: 這個傅立葉變換在數學物理和量子信息中都有其應用。

sentences.english: Fourier method is an effective method of solving this equation.
sentences.chinese: 傅立葉方法是解這一方程的有效方法。

sentences.english: Determine carboxyl content with Fourier infrared spectrum instrument.
sentences.chinese: 用傅立葉紅外光譜儀測定羧基含量。
